briefdescription.para: Whether the distribution changed for a given phase and thus needs LB.
History of mapping that was read in from the data files.
Get the name of the component.
Read LB data from a string stream.
Read LB data from the file specified.
Read the element history from an LB holder.
Return whether a phase needs LB.
Get the elements assigned for a given phase.

simplesect.para: pointer to elements assigned to this node if not skipped

briefdescription.para: Clear history for a given phase.
Add history for a given phase.
Add identical phase to one already present.

parameterdescription.para: the identical phase to be used

briefdescription.para: Reduce distribution changes globally to find where migrations need to occur.
Determine which phases migrations must happen to follow the distribution.
A VT component for reading a user-input mapping file for object to node.

detaileddescription.para: A common flow is for the LBAF (Load Balancing Analysis Framework) to generate a new load distribution offline, producing LB data file, which are then read by this component to follow the LB distribution described in those mapping files.
